RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 6 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FRANGO ELECTRICO had a tardy start, three wide to the turn swept past while tapped twice and cleared in handy fashion to the wire. LIAM'S LASS outside run to the turn while bearing out badly into stretch for place spot in a good effort. TABOO HOO inside trip throughout while racing on for show spot at wire. GOGO GEISHA quick speed to the front, opened up to the turn, weakened readily. MS. T REX pressed pace to stretch with nothing left for the drive, faded. RACE WAS HAND TIMED.

ENTRY.NAME: Gogo Geisha
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick speed to the front, opened up to the turn, weakened readily

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. T Rex
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace to stretch with nothing left for the drive, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Frango Electrico
ENTRY.COMMENT: tardy start, three wide to turn, tapped twice, cleared handily

ENTRY.NAME: Liam's Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside run to turn while bearing out badly into stretch for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Taboo Hoo
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip throughout while racing on for show spot at wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 18000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since June 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FRAGRANT sharp to the front, well handled throughout in complete control. QUIERO MAS unsettled in first turn behind top pair, wide run while no match. MY GOOD FORTUNE chased winner to quarter pole, emptied out in the stretch run. WILDCAT DREAM troubled first turn with no late response when needed inside. ENDLESS inside trip chasing winner while giving way in the stretch run. MAMBO KITTEN stumbled badly from the gate losing all chance while always back. TRULY A DREAM tracked leaders to the half and gave way readily from that point.

ENTRY.NAME: Truly a Dream
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders to the half and gave way readily from that point

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: troubled first turn with no late response when needed inside

ENTRY.NAME: Endless
ENTRY.OWNER: Cox Christopher J and Adams Janey
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip chasing winner while giving way in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: My Good Fortune
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to quarter pole, emptied out in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Mambo Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled badly from the gate losing all chance while always back

ENTRY.NAME: Quiero Mas
ENTRY.COMMENT: unsettled in first turn behind top pair, wide run while no match

ENTRY.NAME: Fragrant
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp to the front, well handled throughout in complete control

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 5F Turf CR: 78. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $6,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since June 6, 2023 Allowe d 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000). (If transferred to the M ain Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIMAJOON blocked inside to turn, roused to go on and responded with urging up the rail to be along in time under stout handling. HOWIZEE dueled to the turn, opened up in the stretch, nailed on wire late. BLUE LILY chased pace throughout from inside to turn, angled out level off. MEDWAY QUEEN broke tardy, inside run to turn while along for show spot. CALTHA speed to turn, bore out into stretch with no late response. SOFIA STRONG outside trip while along evenly with no response in the stretch. GRANITE CANDY speed from the gate, bore out into the turn, dropped back readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Howizee
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled to the turn, opened up in the stretch, nailed on wire late

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Lily
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace throughout from inside to turn, angled out level off

ENTRY.NAME: Mimajoon
ENTRY.COMMENT: blocked inside to turn, roused to go, responded up rail in time

ENTRY.NAME: Medway Queen
ENTRY.OWNER: Crown's Way Racing LLC and South Side Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke tardy, inside run to turn while along for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Granite Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed from the gate, bore out into the turn, dropped back readily

ENTRY.NAME: Caltha
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to turn, bore out into stretch with no late response

ENTRY.NAME: Sofia Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside trip while along evenly with no response in the stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 68. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLOYD G tracked leaders to the turn three wide run to go clear held sway under good handling. GUS GUS no speed to the turn, outside run in the stretch for place spot. LIGHTNING CASHES ran up to duel in two path stayed on in stretch for show spot. THE POINT ROAD off slowly from the gate, far back to the stretch improved late. FORT STROOPE sharp to the lead dueled to the stretch with nothing left. HICKORY BILL never menaced from inside to the turn. COUNT MY DREAMS brief speed to the turn, gave way readily in the stretch run.

ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced from inside to the turn

ENTRY.NAME: The Point Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly from the gate, far back to the stretch improved late

ENTRY.NAME: Count My Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed to the turn, gave way readily in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Fort Stroope
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp to the lead dueled to the stretch with nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Lightning Cashes
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran up to duel in two path stayed on in stretch for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Floyd G
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders to the turn three wide run to go clear held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Gus Gus
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn, outside run in the stretch for place spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 58. Claiming Purse 17800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since June 6, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000 In Last 5 Starts).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CONDEMNATION pressed leader to the turn, opened up into the stretch to hold sway in a good effort. WHISKEY HELPS unhurried to the turn, swung widest into the lane, raced on for place spot. PECKS NOT BAD bobbled from the gate while inside to the turn, on for show. CHOCOLATE RABBIT inside speed to duel stayed to the stretch, gave in readily. HEIDI'S SINATRA broke slow never recovered while always far back. TEQUILA FLATS chased top two for a half, gave way readily in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Chocolate Rabbit
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to duel stayed to the stretch, gave in readily

ENTRY.NAME: Pecks Not Bad
ENTRY.OWNER: Barker Scott W and Barker Carol
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled from the gate while inside to the turn, on for show

ENTRY.NAME: Condemnation
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC WinStar Farm LLC and Check Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed leader to the turn, opened up into the stretch, held sway

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & WinStarFarm, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Heidi's Sinatra
ENTRY.OWNER: Eyerman, Lee J. and Molumby, John
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slow never recovered while always far back

ENTRY.NAME: Tequila Flats
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top two for a half, gave way readily in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Helps
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to the turn, swung widest into the lane for place spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1M Turf CR: 90. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Ove r Since June 6, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $ 15,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRILLIANT JOURNEY sharp to the front, gamely to far turn, held sway to wire in a good effort. LORD REVELSTOKE inside trip never far back, rallied stretch split horses for place. TIGER PAW (IRE) pressed winner to far turn, stayed on gamely in the stretch. FIRST SONG raced along evenly throughout with no late kick when needed. SUBURBAN PRINCE never far back throughout with no late response when needed. AZURE SKY never factored throughout. FUTURE VICTORY failed to menace. SIMON PETER always back never a threat. FALCONS FURY failed to threaten. CODE VIOLATION never a factor. MCGRAW through after half, dropped far back in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Revelstoke
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip never far back, rallied stretch split horses for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Simon Peter
ENTRY.COMMENT: always back never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Brilliant Journey
ENTRY.OWNER: Mark D Kuntz LLC and Dalton Kenneth W
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp to the front, gamely to far turn, held sway to wire

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm & WinStar Farm, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Tiger Paw (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Iavarone Michael Iavarone Julia C Durando Donald Maller Bruce and Meah Anna M
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed winner to far turn, stayed on gamely in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: First Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly throughout with no late kick when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Falcons Fury
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to threaten

ENTRY.NAME: McGraw
ENTRY.OWNER: Borchetta Mike Borchetta Martha and Borchetta Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half, dropped far back in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Suburban Prince
ENTRY.OWNER: Wonderland Racing Stables LLC Davis Mark and Leatherman Ty
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back throughout with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Azure Sky
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 68. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STIRDATPOT ran off in full control from start, dominated the field handily. CARNACK ON TOUR chased top pair to the stretch,rallied to be best of the rest. TENPAK chased winner to far turn, gave in and settle for third spot. LEAD ACTOR no speed throughout, well off rail into the stretch. RIDGERUNNER never a menace throughout. SERPA always outrun. ALY STONE always far back. UTOPIAN TREASURE dropped out of contention, galloped to the wire while far back and walked off.

ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Lead Actor
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed throughout, well off rail into the stretch

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair to the stretch,rallied to be best of the rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 5F Turf CR: 53. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORETASTIC inside speed to the front with a sharp effort to the wire. YAMMY YAMMY BELLA bobbled after start, raced back to the stretch, rallied, no match. JUDY ELAINE good position off rail turn, rallied into stretch for show spot. BELLA VALENTINA chased top pair to the stretch, stayed on gamely between horses. YEHAWMEMAW close up to turn, bolted outside, stayed on in the stretch run. STEPHANIESWARRIOR inside run to turn while never a factor. VALERIE BLUE broke slow from the gate, never menaced throughout. LUCK BE MY LADY never a menace. TONIC AND GIN dropped far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Moretastic
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front with a sharp effort to the wire

ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped far back

ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled after start, raced back to the stretch, rallied, no match

Non-winners Of A Race Since June 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEACH KITTEN inside speed to the front, stayed clear throughout to widen in the final furlong with a handy win. GRANADICA off rail run from the turn, rallied on for place spot. OCEAN HONEY chased winner to the stretch, gave in for show spot. JAMAICAN TRAFFIC no speed to the stretch, improved position only late. NOT A ROLE MODEL always back and outside. YOUDEVILYOUCECILIA through after half and dropped back. ABIGAIL G through early, dropped back readily.
